DOC.brief_title: Carmustine Treating Adults With Recurrent Supratentorial Low-Grade Glioma
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine antitumor activity Gliadel wafer ( carmustine ) treatment recurrent supratentorial low grade glioma . - Assess toxicity therapy patient . OUTLINE : Patients stratify disease ( fibrillary astrocytoma v oligodendroglioma mixed glioma ) . Patients receive 8 Gliadel wafer ( contain carmustine ) implant resected tumor cavity . Patients follow every 2 month . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : This study accrue maximum 68 patient within 18-24 month .
